ACCEPT_TERMS: Please accept the terms and conditions
NOT_ALLOWED: You are not authorized to perform this action!
FORMAT_PASSWORD: Password must be at least 8 characters long, with at least 1 digit and 1 special character.
FORMAT_PHONE: Allowed characters are numeric characters and the following special characters: + (as the first character) [ ] ( ).
FORMAT_WEBSITE: Please enter a URL starting with https://
FORMAT_DATE: Please enter a date in the format 'dd/mm/yyyy'.
FORMAT_DATE2: Please enter a date in the format 'mm/yyyy'.
FORMAT_MAX_TOKENS: The token count must be between 50 and 5000
MIN: The field must contain at least $1 characters.
MAX: The field must not exceed $1 characters.
SAME_PASSWORD: The password is not identical. Please enter it again.
SAME_EMAIL: The field is not identical to the email. Please double-check your input.
NO_ROLE: You are not authorized to view this content.
PERCENTAGE_TOO_LONG: This value cannot be higher than 100%.

S3_BUCKET.INPUTSTREAM: Technical error while uploading the file.
S3_BUCKET.PUT: Technical error while uploading the file.
S3_BUCKET.DELETE: Technical error while deleting the file.

USERNAME_ALREADY_EXIST: The username is already assigned to another member!
EMAIL_ALREADY_EXIST: The email is already assigned to another member!
PAYMENT_FOUND: The payment has already been processed.
